ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] the dangers of digest mode!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... always ... Uhh what s with the summoned daggers?  Sorry to sound like an idiot but umm... why?  Heh never heard that one before (or are you tossing them at
ygData.messageBody:
> On Weapons Vs Songs:
> If we're in a situation that requires tactics and team work I almost
always
> opt for weapons, since our DoTs complicate mes. I also go with weapons in
> a "normal" group. Other than that I tend to use the chants if (1) large
> caster population benifits from debuffs (2) solo'ing or (3) I have a mage
> (and now rogue gaga! =D) about that I can harass for summoned daggers. =)
>

Uhh what's with the summoned daggers? Sorry to sound like an idiot but
umm... why? Heh never heard that one before (or are you tossing them at the
badguy while kiting?)

I use the chants in any battle that there are less than 2 tanks as the haste
songs just don't give them enough benefit to over-ride the power I can lay
down with the chants. Chants don't interfere with Mez because they're
targetted so I'm not sure why you wouldn't use them in groups that are low
on tanks (less than 3).

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
Saryrn Server
